prompt:
A seductive Korean woman in her 20s at a balcony doorway with sheer curtains, framed waist-
up to mid-thigh.
Pose: one hand above head holding the curtain, hips angled, subtle arch.
Expression: half-lidded eyes, parted lips, no smile, confident dominance.
Outfit: cotton jersey fitted top + tailored shorts, matte texture and creases.
Lighting: golden hour backlight filtered through curtains, soft shadow bands, pale wall
bounce, smooth roll-off.
Camera: 85mm f/1.8 handheld candid. Film: Portra 400.
